alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 6:10PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Occasional snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or slushy road conditions, and areas of poor visibility. Hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. This includes travel on I-90 from Livingston to Big Timber, and US-191 from Big Timber to Harlowton and Judith Gap. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Nighttime snowfall should remain light. Snow is expected to be heaviest Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
